name: Hyperblaster
description:
Controls:

Cursor Left - Rotate Left

Cursor Right - Rotate Right

Shift - Thrust

Space - Shoot

Inspired by the 1979 game Asteroids, this fast playing skill based retro arcade game is easy to play but hard to master.

Welcome to the digital domain ...

The world is under attack by cyber criminals using the latest information technology to bring entire governments crashing down.

A relentless new version of the virus .. [code named BINARY] .. has taken control of all critical systems and must be stopped!

You are Logic Bot .. a virus detect and destroy program. During your first encounter with the BINARY virus you have been locked into a hostile program. All exits are encrypted beyond your capabilities so you must reverse engineer the assembler routines and remove all traces of the virus from the the software layers. Your only hope is to blast your way out of there.

Good luck Logic Bot ..
